name: RFC 3986 URI Authority/Domain
description:
Matches a URI authority by following RFC 3986 standards.

The authority format as defined by RFC 3986 is [ userinfo "@" ] host [ ":" port ]

Host matching works on IPv4/6 literals and registered names.
